loans.name: Joaju Group

texts.es:
El comité “Joaju” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní, donde todas ellas trabajan juntas, es por ello que el grupo lleva por nombre Joaju, que significa unión.
Todas ellas se dedican a la cría y venta de animales, con lo cual ayudan a sus hijos y familiares a salir adelante. Es un trabajo muy duro, pero ellas lo hacen por el bien de sus familias.
Felicia, la presidenta, solicita el crédito para la compra de balanceados para sus animales, con lo cual podrá seguir alimentando a sus animales,.
texts.en:
A few women coming from the town of Santaní have joined forces to form the “Joaju” Committee. They all work together in the town of Santaní and for this reason they have chosen to name the group Joaju, meaning “union”.
They all engage in breeding and selling animals, an activity thanks to which they help providing for their children and relatives. It is a very hard job, but they do it for the wellbeing of their families.
Felicia is the president, and she is requesting a loan to buy balanced feed for her animals, thus succeeding in feeding them.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: La Buena Union 4 Group

texts.en:
Leonor is one of the members of the La Buena Unión (The Good Union) 4. They are micro entrepreneurs who are in clothing sales, sales of assorted merchandise, shoes, crafts, etc. Their sales points are in the city of Hato Mayor, a farming community in the northeast of the country.

She lives in a simple home structure with her long-term partner. She says her most difficult challenge has been to establish her business and improve it. From the beginning, it was very hard for her because she didn't have the capital for it.

Leonor is very excited about receiving her fifth loan from Esperanza Internacional, having repaid her previous loan satisfactorily and taken an important step toward her business’s growth. She has had her business for about five years; she has been taking out loans from Esperanza for about four years. She will use this new loan to buy shoes in different sizes and styles. She will use profits to reinvest in her business and to save. She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy shoes to sell.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en: Emelia  is a hairdresser who owns a beauty salon in Batanya near Cape Coast. She is married with three children.  Emelia  has been a hairdresser for a year now.  She uses her income to support her husband and to pay their utility bills. Emelia will use her loan to purchase creams, hair extensions and a hair dryer for her beauty salon. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business

loans.use: to purchase  creams, hair extensions and a hair dryer  for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.es: Lorenza de sesenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su hija, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, huevos, leche, pan, jabones, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su negocio esta ubicado en el lugar donde reside y sus mayores clientes son los vecinos, y las personas que llegan a una cancha cercana los fines de semana, la prefieren porque su tienda es la mas surtida siempre encuentran lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a buenos precios pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Lorenza es una mujer emprendedora, enérgica y muy luchadora, siempre esta buscando alternativas que le ayuden a alcanzar sus metas su mas grande secreto es el esfuerzo y la perseverancia pues sabe que solo así lograra el éxito que tanto desea, como toda buena comerciante quiere ampliar el negocio pero para ello necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, producto instantáneo, bebidas, etc. Lorenza tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lorenza is 61 years old, and she lives with her daughter.  She has a store where she sells basic needs products like rice, beans, eggs, milk, bread, and soap, among others.  She has had the business for several years, and this has gifted her with a lot of sales experience.  

This allows her to get better income.  Her business is located in an area where a lot of people live.  Most of her customers are her neighbors and the people who come to a nearby field for the week-end.  They prefer her because her store is the best stocked.  They always find what they need, a quality product at reasonable prices.  Above all, she provides excellent service.

Lorenza is an enterprising, energetic, and very tenacious woman.  She is always looking for ways to help meet her goals.  Her biggest secret is effort and perseverance.  She knows that this is the only way she will achieve the success she so desires.  

Like all good merchants, she wants to expand her business.  However, she needs capital to do so.  That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy basic grains, candy, bread, instant products, and drinks, etc.  Lorenza has good payment references, and she affirms that she will be able to repay the debt.  At the same time, she has faith that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candy, bread, instant products, and drinks.

loans.name: Felicito

texts.es:
Don Felicito tiene 40 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos. Desde hace 20 años se dedica a la agricultura, trabaja en las fincas como peón, aprendió junto con su abuelo ayudándole a realizar sus cultivos y posteriormente busco trabajo en las fincas de otros amigos. 

Para comprar los insumos agrícolas, él tiene que caminar a pie unos treinta minutos, luego aborda un autobús que tarda otros treinta minutos, cuando compra los insumos paga a un vehiculo para trasladarlos hasta su casa, paga un dólar por quintal.

El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de una arroba de semilla de fríjol, un quintal de abono y foliares; pesticidas para su cultivo. Al comprar sus insumos, podrá aplicarlos a tiempo y obtener mejores resultados e ingresos por la venta de la cosecha.
texts.en:
Felicito, 40, is married and has three children.  He has worked in agriculture for 20 years.  He works as an agricultural worker on farms.  He learned this work with his grandfather, helping him with the crops.  Later he looked for work on the farms of other friends.

To buy the agricultural inputs he has to walk about 30 minutes, then take a bus for another 30 minutes.  When he buys the supplies, he pays a vehicle to transport them to his house.  He pays one dollar per quintal.

He will invest the loan in buying one "arroba" [unit of weight, 11-16 kilograms] of bean seed, one quintal of manure and foliar fertilizer, and pesticide for his crops.  Upon buying the inputs he'll be able to apply them on time and get better results and income for the sale of the harvest.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama sells groundnuts at Batanya near Cape Coast, and she has been selling groundnut for 15 years now.  She is a single parent with five children, so she uses her income to feed, clothe and to pay her children’s school fees.  Ama will use her loan to purchase bags of groundnut to sell. With the new profit, she will expand her business.

loans.use: purchase bags of groundnut to sell.

loans.name: Abena

texts.en: Abena lives together with her husband who is a farmer and their seven children at Batanya near Cape Coast. Abena is a fish monger; she buys fresh fish from the market and smokes it before selling it. She has been in this business for 10 years now. She uses her income to support her husband in paying their children’s school fees. Abena wants to buy the fish in large quantities, so she needs a loan from Kiva to enable her to get the amount of fish she wants to smoke. With the new profit, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Baktygul

texts.ru:
Бактыгул 41 год, замужем. Бактыгул работает помощником повара в школе и в качестве дополнительного дохода с 2008  года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 5,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Бактыгул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова с приплодом, 5 голов овец. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет 15,000 сом.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бактыгул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота на откорм.  Доходы от кредита Бактыгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Baktygul is 41 years old and married. She works as an assistant cook in a school. 

Since 2008, Baktygul has been raising livestock as a means of supplementing her salary. She began this business with only 5,000 Kyrgystan Som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, Baktygul's farm now has 1 dairy cow and calf, and 5 head of sheep. Her farm brings in a monthly income of 15,000 Som.

Baktygul approached Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan in the amount of 50,000 Kyrgystan Som for the purpose of developing her business. She will use these funds to purchase cattle for fattening. Baktygul plans to re-invest the profit generated by this loan into her business by further increasing her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Agenes

texts.en: Agenes fries doughnuts to sell at Batanya near Cape Coast, which she has done for some time now. She is a widow with three children, so she is responsible for feeding, clothing  and paying her children's school fees. She uses her income for these expenses. Agenes needs this loan to enable her to purchase bags of flour, sugar and cooking oil for her doughnuts. With the new profit, she will save to give her children a better education.

loans.use: to purchase bags of flour, sugar and cooking oil for her doughnuts

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy animals to sell

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es:
Don Manuel tiene 45 años de edad, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Desde hace 25 años se dedica a la caficultura, tiene cinco años de poseer un camión que le sirve para realizar viajes a otras personas y para él mismo. Este trabajo siempre lo ha realizado, fue con su familia que aprendió esa actividad. Los productos que necesita los adquiere en una cooperativa de caficultores que esta a veinte minutos de su casa y en otras ocasiones viaja a otra ciudad que esta más lejos a una hora y veinte minutos de su casa. Los productos los traslada en su camión y los almacena en su bodega; para posteriormente sus empleados los trasladan a la finca cargándolos en su espalda. 

El préstamo lo invertirá en la construcción de una galera para guardar sus vehículos y para la compra de 10 sacos de abono. Con la construcción de la galera, protegerá sus vehículos del sol y la lluvia, se ahorrara en mantenimiento, ya que la pintura se deteriora y los empaques, etc. Además que le brindara a su plantación de café los fertilizantes que necesita obteniendo cada vez mejores resultados.
texts.en:
Manuel, 45, is married and has four children.  He has worked in coffee production for 25 years.  For five years he has had a truck he uses for himself and to transport other people.  He always has done this work, which he learned from his family.

He gets the products he needs in a coffee co-op about 20 minutes from his house.  Other times he goes farther, to another city about an hour and twenty minutes away.  He transports the products in his truck and stores them in his cellar.  Later his employees carry them to the farm on their backs.

He'll use the loan to build a covered area to store his vehicles and to buy 10 sacks of fertilizer.  By building this he'll protect his vehicles from the sun and rain, and save in maintenance costs because of the deterioration of paint, seal, etc.  In addition, he'll treat his coffee farm with the necessary fertilizer, getting better results all the time.

loans.use: to build a covered area for his vehicles and to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Rahimjon

texts.ru:
Рахимчон проживает в районе Бохтар. Ему 29 лет. Он женат, отец одного ребенка. Рахимчон арендует помещение, где открыл цех по производству кондитерских и хлебобулочных изделий. В этой области он работает год. В производстве Рахимчону помогает его жена.  
Рахимчон берет кредит для приобретения высококачественной духовки.
texts.en:
Rahimjon lives in the Bohtar region. He is 29 years old and is the father of one child.

Rahimjon rents a building where he has opened a shop that produces baked goods and confections. He has been operating this business for a year, and his wife assists him.   

Rahimjon is seeking a loan in order to purchase a high-quality oven for his business.

loans.use: to purchase a high-quality oven

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua cooks and sells banku, a dish made from corn dough and served hot. She serves it with fried fish, pepper and tomato sauce. She is married with four children and lives in Batanya near Cape Coast.  Ekua has been in this business for five years. She uses her income to support her husband and for the general upkeep of her family. Her loan will be used to  purchase bags of maize and fish which she uses in preparing her banku for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to open a stall for the sale of her cooked banku and fish.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize and fish to prepare banku for sale.

loans.name: Islomjon

texts.ru: Исломчон проживает в городе Исфара. Он холост. Ему 19 лет. Исломчон занимается торговлей. У него имеется торговая точка, где он продает продукты и хозяйственные товары. Торговлей он занимается десять лет. Исломчон привозит продукты из города Худжанд. Он просит кредит для покупки продуктов, чтобы увеличить оборот.
texts.en:
Islomjon lives in the city of Isfara. He is 19 years old and single. 

Islomjon works in trade. He has a sales outlet where he sells food products and household goods. He has been working in this area for 10 years. 

Islomjon brings in the goods he sells from the city of Khujand. He is seeking a loan to purchase more products in order to increase his turnover.

loans.use: to buy more goods for re-sale

loans.name: Anna Liza

texts.en:
Anna Liza is 44 years old and married with six children. Three of her children currently go to school.

Anna Liza works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items, such as shampoo, groceries, etc., to sell.

Anna Liza has borrowed and paid 20 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from a restaurant. She aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy items, such as shampoo and groceries, to sell

loans.name: Sou-Le Group

texts.fr: SOU-LE est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Mansouratou (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 33 ans et est mariée à un certain Coulibaly. Mansouratou et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants et assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Il y a quelques années que Mansouratou exerce comme activité, la vente des bijoux. Mansouratou exerce cette activité passionnément, ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Mansouratou s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue d’augmenter son fonds de roulement, Mansouratou sollicite un premier crédit avec les autres membres du groupe SOU-LE. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en: Sou-Le is a group of three people who live in the same district. The representative of the group, Mansouratou (whose hand is raised in the photo) is 33 years old and married to a man named Coulibaly. She and her husband live with their children and cover the various household expenses between them.  For the past few years Mansouratou has been selling jewelry as a business. She is passionate about her business and it allows her to provide for her own needs as well as those of her children. She gets her supplies in a Benin market. With a view to satisfying customer demand and increasing her working capital, Mansouratou is requesting a first loan with the other members of the Sou-Le group. This loan will be used to respond to their customer demand and to make more money for themselves.

loans.use: to buy jewelry.

loans.name: Baby Jane

texts.en:
Baby Jane is 33 years old and married with three children.

Baby Jane works hard to provide for her family. She runs a charcoal retail business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Baby Jane has borrowed and paid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the charcoal retail for four years and also earns an income from fish vending.

Baby Jane aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Zubaydullokhon

texts.ru:
Зубайдуллохон десять лет занимается торговлей. На сегодняшний день у него имеется небольшой магазин, где он продает мобильные телефоны и их запчасти. 
Зубайдуллохону 20 лет. Он холост. Зубайдуллохон живет с родителями. Он просит кредит для покупки запчастей мобильных телефонов.
texts.en: Zubaydullokhon has been involved in sales for ten years.  Today, he has a small store, where he sells mobile phones and their spare parts.  Zubaydullokhon is 20 years old, single and lives with his parents.  He is requesting this loan to purchase spare parts for mobile phones.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for mobile phones

loans.name: Sabo

texts.ru:
Сабо жительница города Исфара. Ей 52 года. Она разведена. Сабо является матерью двоих детей. Сын Сабо уехал в Россию. 
Сабо портниха. Она занимается шитьем национальных платьев. В этой области Сабо имеет богатый опыт. Шитьем она занимается десять лет. Она берет заказы у себя дома. Сабо берет кредит для покупки тканей, чтобы сшить платья для продажи.
texts.en: Sabo is a resident of the city of Isfara.  She is 52 years old, divorced and a mother of two children.  Sabo's son left to go to Russia.  Sabo is a seamstress.  She is involved in sewing national dresses.  Sabo has a rich experience in this field.  She has been involved in sewing for ten years.  She accepts her work orders at home.  Sabo is requesting this loan to purchase fabrics in order to sew dresses for sale.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics in order to sew dresses for sale

loans.name: Olmakhon

texts.ru: Олмахон очень трудолюбивая и целеустремленная женщина, но не смотря на все ее усилия, уже несколько лет она не может отремонтировать свой дом. Ей 43 года, она замужем и на воспитании имеет 6 детей. Более 21 года она является главным врачом поликлиники. Она очень упорно работает и любит свою работу, но ее зарплата не хватает для ремонта дома.  Олмахон  запрашивает займ на сумму  1400 долларов США  для покупки строительных материалов. Олмахон  и ее дети будут ждать, пока добрые кредиторы помогут им решить проблему жилья.
texts.en:
Olmakhon is a very hard-working and determined woman, but despite all her efforts, she has been unable to repair her house for the past several years.

Olmakhon is 43 years old, married and has 6 children. For over 21 years, she has been the chief physician at a polyclinic. She loves her job and works very hard, but her salary is insufficient to cover the cost of fixing her home. 

Olmakhon is seeking a loan in the amount of 1,400 US dollars to purchase construction materials. She and her children will be very grateful to the kind-hearted Kiva lenders who help them to solve their problems with their house.

loans.use: to buy building materials for home repairs

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is 48 years old and married with four children.

Carmen works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Carmen has borrowed and paid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Carmen aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Erkingul

texts.ru:
Эркингул 43 года, вдова, воспитывает 5 детей, младшей дочери 5 лет. Эркингул в качестве основного дохода с 1990  года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 20,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Эркингул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова с приплодом, 1 лошадь, 16 голов овец. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет 10,000 сом.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Эркингул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота на откорм.  Доходы от кредита Эркингул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины в целях откорма и перепродажи, чтобы накопить средства на обучение среднего сына.
texts.en: Erkingul is 43 years old, a widow and raising five children, the youngest of whom is her five-year-old daughter.  To provide the primary source of income, Erkingul has been involved in animal husbandry since 1990, having started this business with 20,000 som.  Thanks to her hard work, today her business contains one dairy cow with offspring, one horse and 16 sheep.  The monthly income from the business amounts to 10,000 som.  In order to further develop her business, Erkingul requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy livestock for fattening up.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities for fattening up and resale in order to save money to educate her middle son.

loans.use: to buy livestock for fattening up

loans.name: Oybahor

texts.ru: Ойбахор жительница района Шахритус. Ей 38 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж находится в России. Сама она занимается скотоводством. Ойбахор разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. В этой области она 4 года. Ойбахор просит кредит для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Oybahor is a resident of the Shahrituz district.  She is 38 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband is in Russia.  Oybahor is involved in animal husbandry.  She breeds cattle at home.  She has been in this business for four years.  Oybahor is requesting this loan to buy bulls.

loans.use: to buy bulls

loans.name: Mansur

texts.ru: Мансур проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 32 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его жена работает продавщицей в продуктовом магазине. Сам Мансур занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности он занимается четыре года. Мансур берет кредит для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Mansur lives in the Shahrituz district.  He is 32 years old, married and has three children.  His wife works as a salesperson at a food market.  Mansur is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been in this business for four years.  Mansur is requesting this loan to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Nancy Esmeralda

texts.es: Nancy Esmeralda de veintiséis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida Noé y su hijo Jonathan; ella posee una panadería donde comercia pan en variedad dulce o salado, tortas, pastelitos, semitas, pan francés entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la cocina, el local es alquilado y esta ubicado en una zona estratégica muy transida por personas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y el servicio inigualable siempre a la orden del cliente; Nancy es una mujer dedicada a su labor, activa y muy luchadora, todos los días se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse un futuro mejor para ella y su familia ya que son lo mas importante en su vida; como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio pues sabe que si aumenta la producción también aumentaran las ganancias, pero para eso necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina, azúcar, levadura, dulce, leche, huevos, etc. Nancy Esmeralda tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad economía.
texts.en:
Nancy Esmeralda, 26, lives with her life companion, Noé, and her son Jonathan.  She has a bakery where she sells all types of savory and sweet bread like cakes, turnovers, rolls and French bread, among others.  She’s been in business for several years and has gained quite a bit of experience cooking.  She leases the space for the bakery and it’s in a strategic location with many passersby.  She’s acquired a large clientele who prefer her because of the quality, good prices and exceptional service; she’s always at her customers’ disposal.

Nancy is a woman who’s dedicated to her work; she’s active and very tenacious.  She works to the maximum degree every day to earn a better future for her and her family; they are the most important things in her life.

Like all good merchants, Nancy wants to increase business because she knows that if she increases production, profits will increase too.  But to do so she needs capital which is why she’s asked Integral for a loan to buy flour, sugar, yeast, sweetener, milk, eggs, etc.  Nancy Esmeralda has good payment references and is sure that she will be able to repay the loan while at the same time has faith that she will be able to bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, sweetener, milk and eggs.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is 62 years old and married with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Cristina has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 19,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business.

Cristina has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-vending business

loans.name: Mahfirat

texts.ru: Махфират 45 лет,замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. В поисках источника дохода Махфират начала свой бизнес в 1995 году с 9 кг фруктов. А в 2005 году с целью увеличения своего товарооборота Махфират обратилась в нашу организацию. С тех пор она кредитуется в организации "Арванд" и она очень довольна.В период  кредитования она доказала  свою честность и добросовестность.А на полученный доходы она отремонтировала свой дом, увеличила свой товарооборот, оплачивает учебы своих детей. В связи с переходом на весенний  период она хочет увеличить свой ассортимент товаров и надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Mahfirat is 45 years old, married and has 4 children. 

Searching for a source of income, Mahfirat opened her own business in 1995 with 9 kilograms of fruit. In 2005, Mahfirat approached MDO Arvand for a loan for the purpose of increasing her turnover. Since then, Mahrifat has taken several loans from Arvand and is very satisfied. She has shown herself to be honest and conscientious. She has used her income to repair her home, increase her turnover and pay for her children's education.

Now, as autumn approaches, Mahfirat is seeking a loan as she wants to expand the range of goods she sells. She is hoping for support from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase  fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Bakhtier

texts.ru: Он очень ответственный человек. Его зовут Бахтиер.  Ему 35  лет, женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Его отец умер, когда он был школьником и все семейные проблемы легли на него и его больную маму.  Они занимались купле продажей разных мелочных товаров. Прошли годы и семейный расход увеличивался. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами Бахтиер начал дополнительный бизнес скотоводство. Уже более 12 лет он занимается этим бизнесом. Данное время он имеет 10 коров и 30 баранов. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки корма для скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: He is a very responsible person.  His name is Bakhtier.  He is 35 years old, married and raising three children.  His father died when Bakhtier was a school student, and all of the family problems landed on him and his ill mother.  They were involved in buying and selling various small goods.  Years have passed, and the family's expenses increased.  In order to provide his family with all of the necessities, Bakhtier started an additional business in animal husbandry.  He has been involved in this business for over 12 years now.  At the present time, he has 10 cows and 30 sheep.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of 5000 somoni to purchase livestock feed.  He relies on your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Domestica

texts.en:
Domestica works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business selling fertilized duck eggs in the Philippines.

Domestica requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional duck eggs to sell. She has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Domestica would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional duck eggs to sell

loans.name: Fotima

texts.ru: Фотима трудолюбивая и честная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж получает маленькую зарплату. Это зарплата не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Фотима   решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес с шитьем женских одежд, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2400 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Fotima is a hardworking and honest woman.  She is married and raising two children.  Her husband earns a small salary.  This salary is not sufficient to provide the family with all of the necessities.  Fotima decided to help her husband in order to improve the family's welfare.  For this, she completed a course, called "Achieve Success," organized by the Association of Business Women, and obtained a certificate.  Now, she can organize her business and become successful in this field.  She wants to organize a business of sewing women's clothing because she has experience in this type of business.  Fotima plans to provide her children with a good education and high-calorie food products.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 2400 somoni to purchase a sewing machine in order to organize the new business.  She relies on your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine in order to organize the new business

loans.name: Gayratjon

texts.ru: Гайратчон проживает в городе Худжанд. Ему 46 лет. Он вдовец. Гайратчон имеет среднее образование. У него имеется пекарня, где он печет лепешки и кульчу для торговли. Этим видом деятельности Гайратчон занимается десять лет. Он берет кредит для покупки муки, масла, молока и дров.
texts.en: Gayratjon lives in the city of Khujand.  He is 46 years old and a widower.  Gayratjon has a secondary education.  He has a bakery, where he bakes flatbread and kulcha (Tajik flatbread) for sale.  Gayratjon has been involved in this business for ten years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase flour, butter, milk and wood.

loans.use: to purchase flour, butter, milk and wood

loans.name: Aisalkyn

texts.ru:
Айсалкын 65 лет, замужем, воспитала 8 детей. Айсалкын в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, занимается полеводством  и животноводством, начав этот бизнес 12 лет назад  с суммы в 1,000 сом (KGS ). Благодаря упорному труду Айсалкын в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 2 дойных коров с приплодом, 3 головы лошади, 15 голов овец, ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 5,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айсалкын обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку овец для откорма и перепродажи.  Доходы от кредита Айсалкын планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса, а в этом году хотела бы провести капитальный ремонт сарая.
texts.en:
Aisalkyn is 65 years old, married, and has raised 8 children. 

As the main breadwinner of the family, Aisalkyn grows crops and raises livestock. She started this business 12 years ago with a sum of only 1,000 Kyrgyzstan Som (KGS). Thanks to her persistent hard work, Aisalkyn now has 2 dairy cows with calves, 3 horses, 15 sheep, and the monthly income from her farm is around 5,000 Som (KGS).

Aisalkyn has approached Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan in the amount of 60,000 Som (KGS) in order to develop her business. She will use the money to purchase sheep to fatten and re-sell. Aisalkyn plans to use the income generated by this loan to re-invest in her business. This year she would like to carry out major repairs to her barn.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Iván, es soltero y no tiene hijos; vive en un cuarto alquilado, en la zona San Antonio de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja como empleado en una empresa privada ya que con lo que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alquileres, alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos. Iván también estudia Comunicación.
El crédito lo requiere para el pago de diplomado de sus estudios en la carrera de comunicación ya que no le alcanza para poder pagarlo.
El sueño de Iván, es mejorar sus ingresos y adquirir una casa en anticrético para ahorrar en el pago de alquileres.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Iván’s single and has no children.  He lives in a rented room in the city of La Paz’s San Antonio zone.  He’s currently an employee in a private firm and has to pay rental, food, education and basic utility expenses with what he earns.  Iván is majoring in communication.  He needs the loan to pay for his final course in communication because he can’t afford to otherwise.  Iván’s dream is to improve his income and to get a house in the ‘anticrético’ modality [transaction whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner could lose the property to you] in order to save rental costs.  This is the second loan request to Impro and first to Kiva.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora Alicia de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de medicina popular, acetaminofén, jarabe para tos, ibuprofeno, dolofin, entre otros, tiene varios años con el pequeño negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas, esta ubicado en el lugar donde vive y es muy conocida y recomendada por las personas de la localidad pues el producto que comercia es muy confiable, de primera calidad y a precio accesible además de un excelente servicio; Dora Alicia es una mujer emprendedora , dedicada a su labor con muchas ganas de salir adelante y triunfar, su mas grande secreto es el esfuerzo y la perseverancia sabe que solo así lograra el éxito que desea; como toda comerciante ahora que aumento la demanda se decidido a realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar medicina por mayor. Dora Alicia tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dora Alicia, 38, lives with her life companion and their three children in her own house.  She sells popular medicine: acetaminophen, cough syrup, ibuprofen, Dolofin [analgesic], among others.  She’s had this small business for several years and she’s acquired much sales experience.  It’s located where she lives and she’s very well-known and recommended by local residents because the products she sells are trustworthy, top quality and at affordable prices; besides service is excellent.

Dora Alicia is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work and very much wants to get ahead and be successful.  Her greatest secret is effort and perseverance.  She knows that’s the only way to reach the success she desires.

Like all merchants, now that demand has increased she’s decided to make a new investment but needs capital to do so which is why she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy medicine at wholesale.  Dora Alicia has good payment references and is sure that she will be able to repay the loan while at the same time has faith that she will be able to bring home a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy medicine at wholesale.

loans.name: Mehmonali

texts.ru: Мехмонали житель города Худжанд. Ему 42 года. Мехмонали живет с женой. Он является отцом троих детей. Мехмонали вместе с семьей занимается выпечкой и продажей лепешек. У него имеется собственная пекарня. В этой области Мехмонали работает более 12 лет. Он просит кредит для покупки муки.
texts.en: Mehmonali is a resident of the city of Khujand.  He is 42 years old, lives with his wife and is father of three children.  Mehmonali and his family are involved in baking and selling flatbread.  He owns a bakery.  Mehmonali has been working in this field for over 12 years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase flour.

loans.use: to purchase flour

loans.name: Khitam

texts.en:
Khitam is a 49-year-old conservative married woman, so she asked her daughter Iman to take her place in the photo.

her husband has two salaries; one is the retirement salary and his salary from his other job. their daughter Iman is a 21-year-old university student, living with her three sisters and one brother. Her parents wants to support her in her educational fees so Khitam applied for this loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Nada

texts.en:
Nada a 42-year-old conservative mother, so she asked her son Ahmed to take her place in the photo. 

Ahmed is a 26-year-old married guy, and he has a full time job. Now he wants to register himself in the university to continue studying and get a masters degree that will help him improve himself and his skills and elevate his educational level. So his mother applied for this loan to pay his registration fees.

loans.use: to pay for her son's registration fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more food products to enlarge number of product in store

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en:
Saleh is a 58-year-old man. He is married and has three children. Saleh has a permanent job in a sugar factory, where he works from 8 a.m. to 2 p.m.. His salary as a general worker is too low to cover his family's needs. He comes to work to his shop after 2 p.m. Ten years ago he started to seek new options to make money and an idea about opening a mobile phone shop came into his mind. Now he is a successful entrepreneur and his monthly income is 400 AZN.  He hired his son as a salesman and now the mobile phone shop is considered the family business. His store is successful because he has a very good location in the central bazaar. He primarily sells mobile accessories and numbers.

Now he would like to help his son get married and for this purpose he needs more investments in his shop. He applied for 1500 AZN and this will be his third loan. He is a trusted client of AqroInvest and we wish him all the best.

loans.use: to buy more phone accessories

loans.name: Lamara

texts.en:
Lamara is from Gardabani district in East Georgia. She is 56 years old and lives with her husband and mother-in-law. Her husband has chronic health problems and gets a relevant pension from the local government.  Lamara’s mother-in-law is a pensioner. The family runs a small dairy farm -- 2 milk cows and 2 calves. Lamara produces cheese, which is sold to cheese retailers. She has hens as well and is involved in poultry farming. The family cultivates family-owned land where different kinds of vegetables are grown. Lamara is very hard-working woman with a rich experience in her work.

Lamara requested a loan to purchase calves and piglets. She plans to raise, fatten and sell them at a good price. After a year, the family will be able to get a profit. With the received profit, Lamara will purchase more agricultural land and cultivate and sow maize and Lucerne (alfalfa). This will significantly increase the income for the family and all members will improve their living conditions.

loans.use: buy calves and piglets

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en: Elvira is 50 years old, widowed, and has five children. She works very hard to provide for them. Elvira runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional inventory to sell. Elvira has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, coffee, eggs, spices, shampoo, etc. In the future Elvira would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory for her store

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 43 years old, married, and has five children. Erlinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more inventory to sell in her general store.

Erlinda has borrowed and paid 24 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 23 years and also earns an income by selling rice and gasoline. Erlinda aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more inventory to sell in her general store

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 32 years old, married, and has three children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Esther is borrowing 29,500 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Esther has been raising pigs for 15 years and also earns additional income from farming rice. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 62 years old and married with 6 children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Evangeline runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell.

Evangeline has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as spices, cooking oil, eggs, soft drinks, noodles, etc.. 

In the future Evangeline would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn is 34 years old, married, and has three children who are in school. Evelyn is in the agricultural business farming vegetables in the Philippines. She requested a 23,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. Evelyn has been farming vegetables for six years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Felecita

texts.en:
Felecita is 48 years old, married, and has three children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her general store.

Felecita has borrowed and paid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from a restaurant. Felecita aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Señor Del Calvario Group

texts.es:
La socia Marizza tiene 42 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos (19, 17,12),  ella es natural de la ciudad de Calca y vive en la misma ciudad donde nacio. La socia Marizza es una joven emprendedora y responsable que le gusta los restos pues tiene un puesto de venta de ropas y zapatos por catálogos. Ya son cinco años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Marizza requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo zapatos y ropa. Su sueño de Marizza es abrir un restaurante donde se venderá el rico ceviche. (La socia Marizza está levantando la mano en la fotografía). 

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “Señor del Calvario” en la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; compra y venta  de maíz, venta de abarrotes de abarrotes, venta de frutas, venta de comida y otros brindan servicio de taxi.  

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Marizza, 42, is married and has three children (19, 17 and 12 years of age).  She is from the city of Calca and still lives there.  Marizza is a responsible, enterprising, young woman who likes challenges.  She has a stand where she sells clothes and shoes via catalogue.  She’s been in this business for five years now and does very well.  

On this occasion, Marizza needs the loan to buy merchandise like shoes and clothes, for example.  Her dream is to open a restaurant to sell delicious ‘ceviche’ [marinated seafood cocktail].  Marizza is raising her hand in the photo.

This group is composed of neighbors and friends who formed the “Señor del Calvario” (Lord of Calvary) communal bank in Calca Province, Cusco Department.  The communal bank is formed by people who are always in search of opportunities to get ahead through their daily efforts and to provide a better future for their children.  Some of the various activities of the members are: buying and selling corn, grocery sales, fruit sales, food sales and some of the provide taxi service.

The members as a whole are grateful for the opportunity provided and commit to make their various installment payments as scheduled.  

Cusco is located in Cusco District and Province in Cusco Department.  It’s at the very heart of the ancient city of the Incas and is noted for being a tourist destination because of its archaeological sites, its historic city center, its scenery, its history and for being an enchanting city in the southern region of the country.  Cusco is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like shoes and clothes.

loans.name: German

texts.es:
German está casado y tiene tres hijos los cuales están en etapa escolar; la familia  vive en casa de los padres de German, ocupando una habitación pequeña, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudió solo hasta la secundaria y actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja como chofer de taxi de su propiedad por más de diez horas al día y hasta altas horas de la noche ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento (cambio de aceites, compra  de llantas y  una batería, además de chequear los frenos) de su vehículo que  es su única fuente de ingresos.
El sueño de German es vivir en una casa en anticrético para dar más comodidad a su familia, mejorar su calidad de vida y ahorrar en el alquiler.
Es la tercera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
German is married and has three school age children.  The family lives in a small room in German’s parents’ house.  The house is located in the Alto San Pedro area of the city of La Paz.

He only went to school up until high school.  He currently gets income working as a taxi driver with his own vehicle.  He works for over ten hours a day into the late hours of the night.  He does this because he needs to cover his family’s expenses for food, education, and basic services.

The loan that he needs is for maintenance on his vehicle (change the oil, buy tires and a battery, and check the brakes).  The vehicle is his only source of income.

Geman’s dream is to live in a house under the “anticrético” mode [transaction whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner loses the property to you].  He wants to do this in order to make his family more comfortable, to improve their quality of life, and to save the rent.

This is the third time he has worked with IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to provide maintenance for his taxi.

loans.name: Alfarero Group

texts.es:
El grupo Alfarero lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Irene quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos desde hace 6 años y una tiene una pequeña pulpería la cual poco a poco ha ido aumentando.
Las otras integrantes son Fabiola quien vende esquimos y cervezas; y Heydi quien vende ropa
texts.en: The Alfarero Communal Bank is made up of three hardworking and enterprising people. One of them is Irene, who has been selling cosmetics for six years and has a small store, which she has gradually been expanding. The other members are Fabiola, who sells Eskimo ice cream products and beer and Heydi, who sells clothing.

loans.use: to buy underwear, perfume and cosmetics

loans.name: Jaime

texts.en: Jaime is married and has one child. Jaime is 46 years old and lives in Cabilinan, Aurora. To earn a living, Jaime is in the transportation business, serving in his community. He has had this business for 10 years. Each month, he earns 7,000 PHP doing this work. He has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. Jaime has been a member of GDMPC since 2011. In the future, Jaime hopes to purchase another motorcycle for his transportation business.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling live lobsters in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to purchase more live lobsters to sell for her business.

Helen has been in this business for 12 years. Helen earns more income from fishing.

Helen has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more live lobsters to sell

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 54 years old and married with five children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Imelda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Imelda has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, spices, eggs, noodles, etc. 

In the future, Imelda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling rice in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 50,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Irene has been in this business for 32 years. Irene earns more income from farming rice.

Irene has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Jacquiline

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Jacquiline works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell cosmetics business in the Philippines and earns additional income from farming rice. Jacquiline is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell in her cosmetics business.

Jacquiline has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell

loans.name: Junil

texts.en: Junil is a 37-year old, single man living in Taguitic, Kapatagan. In order to add income in the family, he entered into a buying and selling of crabs business which started 5 years ago. He usually gets 6,500 PHP per month. With the help of GDMPC microcredit, Junil was able to buy more crabs to sell because of the money, amounting to 15,000 PHP, rendered to him. He joined GDMPC in 2008. Someday, he's hoping for much greater revenue for business expansion.

loans.use: to buy more crabs to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy work tools and supplies for her salon.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es:
Orlando, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos los cuales ya son todos independientes, vive en casa propia ocupando solo una habitación pequeña con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa esta ubicada en la zona San Antonio Bajo de la ciudad de La Paz
Actualmente percibe ingresos provenientes de su trabajo como carpintero por más de diez horas al día realizando todo tipo de trabajos en madera, ya que es el único que cubre los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material para la refacción de su habitación ya que las paredes se encuentran muy deterioradas (necesita comprar ladrillos, cemento, estuco y pinturas.
El sueño de Orlando, es construir más habitaciones y un  baño en su casa y poder acoger a sus hijos de esta forma también mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la décimo primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la segunda vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Orlando’s married and has four children all of which are independent now. He lives in his own house occupying a single room with brick walls and dirt floor; the house is located in the city of La Paz’s San Antonio Bajo zone.

He currently earns income working as a carpenter more than ten hours daily doing all kinds of work with wood; he is the only one who covers food and basic utility costs for his family.

He needs the loan to buy materials and supplies to refurbish his room because the walls are quite deteriorated.  He needs to buy bricks, cement, stucco and paint.

Orlando’s dream is to build more rooms and a bathroom at home so that his children can move in and also to improve his quality of life.  This is his 11th loan request with IMPRO and second with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 17 years. Jocelyn earns more income from pig fattening and selling cosmetics.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Florenda

texts.en: Florenda, a 54-year-old widow with 7 children, resides in Lapinig, Kapatagan, where she has been operating a family member's general store for 3 years, earning a monthly income of 4,000 PHP. In 2009, Florenda joined GDMPC. She is now requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee. In the future, Florenda wants to build a house and supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en: Marilou, 40 years old, is married with three grown up children. Marilou has been engaged in selling different personal products in the community for 20 years. Marilou wants to expand her business so that's why she needs additional capital. Marilou is requesting a loan of PHP 8, 000 to buy lotion, shampoo, clothes and pants to offer in the community to meet the needs of her children in school.

loans.use: to purchases lotion, shampoo, clothes and pants for her business

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: 44-year-old Gloria is married with four grown up children. She says that for the 11 years in her business, she has met different people. She is a friendly person and loving mother. Gloria is asking for a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy parts of watches to expand her business so that she can meet all the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy watch parts for her watch repair business

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha  es casada y tiene cuatro hijos los cuales están en etapa escolar, viven en casa propia ocupando solo una habitación con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona  Las Lomas de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente ha cambiado de rubro y ahora percibe ingresos vendiendo frutas en un carrito de forma ambulante ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de fruta por cantidad (piñas, plátanos, naranjas, manzanas),  ya que desea mejorar sus ingresos y aumentar la variedad de su mercadería.
El sueño de Martha, es construir más habitaciones en su casa para dar más comodidad a su familia  y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Martha is married and has four children who are school age.  They live in her house occupying a single room with brick walls and dirt floor.  The house is located in the city of La Paz’s Las Lomas zone.

She has changed her line of work and now is earning income selling fruit from place to place in a little cart.  She must cover her family’s food, education and basic utility costs.

She needs the loan to buy fruit in quantity (pineapples, bananas, oranges, apples) because she wants to improve her income and increase the variety of her merchandise.

Martha’s dream is to add more rooms to her house to provide more comfort for her family and improve their quality of life.  This is the second loan request to Impro and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 56-year-old married woman from Baclayon, Bohol, Philippines. She has been engaged in a fish vending business for more than five years now. This business provides her the income that she needs for the family expenses.

Elizabeth is asking for a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy more fish to sell and a fish bucket for storage. With this loan, she will be able to sell more fresh fish to the people in their place.

In the future, Elizabeth aims to make her business a success so that it will continue to generate income.

loans.use: to buy more fish and a fish bucket

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en: Jesusa is from Anonang, Aurora. She is 50 years old. Jesusa is married and has three children. To make a living, Jesusa has been running a general store for 7 years and earns 4,000 PHP a month for these activities. Jesusa is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase more items such as shampoo, toothpaste, etc. to sell. In 2011, Jesusa joined GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase more items such as shampoo, toothpaste, etc.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: A very hardworking and loving mother, Mary is asking a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy ingredients for her rice cakes that she can offer to the community. Mary is well known in the community for making the best rice cake. She dreams that she can build her own stall to display her rice cakes.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like bananas, rice and sugar for her business

loans.name: Golondrinas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Golondrinas lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Yamileth quien tiene una venta de golosinas y pequeños productos. Con el crédito anterior logro realizar estantes y cambiar el techo del negocio, con este desea surtirla con mayor variedad de productos.
Las otras integrantes son Carolina quien tiene una pulpería y Rebeca quien vende tortillas, frijoles, queso, huevo, crema…etc.
texts.en:
The “Golondrinas” (The Swallows) group has three hardworking, enterprising members.  One of them is Yamileth who sells snacks and small products.  She used the previous loan to buy display cases and replace the store’s roof.  She wants to use this one to stock it with a greater variety of products.  

The other group members are Carolina who has a grocery store and Rebeca who sells tortillas, beans, cheese, eggs, cream, etc.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise like snacks, soft-drinks, etc.

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es:
Néstor, es casado y tiene tres hijos los cuales ya son independientes. Nestor vive en casa de sus suegros ocupando solo una habitación con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz.
Néstor estudió solo hasta terminar la secundaria y actualmente percibe ingresos  como chofer por más de diez horas al día ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de su vehículo (cambio de aceites y chequeo de frenos) ya que es la única fuente de trabajo que tiene.
El sueño de Néstor es mejorar sus ingresos y adquirir una casa en anticrético ya que desea tener más comodidad y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la cuarta vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Néstor’s married and has three children who are already independent.  Néstor lives in his in-laws’ house occupying a single room with brick walls and dirt floor.  The house is located in the city of La Paz’s Achachicala zone.

Néstor finished secondary school and currently earns income as a taxi driver working more than ten hours daily because he must cover his family’s food and basic utility costs.

He needs the loan to service his vehicle (oil change and brake check) because it’s his only source of income.  His dream is to improve his income and get a house under the ‘anticrético’ modality [transaction whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner could lose the property to you] because he wants to have more comfort and improve his quality of life.    This is his fourth loan request to Impro and first to Kiva.

loans.use: to service his taxi.

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en: Anecita is from Romarate, Aurora. She is 70 years old. She is married and has 4 children. To make a living, Anecita owns and operates a "sari-sari" or general store. She has been engaged in her business for 9 years and earns 4,000 PHP a month from these activities. In 2008, Anecita joined GDMPC. Anecita is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, soaps etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, soaps etc

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is married and has four children. Elizabeth is 50 years old and resides in Aurora. Elizabeth owns and operates a farm, planting & harvesting coconuts for sale to earn a living. She's been in this business for five years. Each month, she earns 7,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2010, Elizabeth joined GDMPC. In the future, Elizabeth wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita has been engaged in a food vending business for more than eight years now. She lives in Baclayon, Bohol, Philippines and is a mother of five children. She bakes bread and pastries and sells them to the people in their community. It is a good venture and it provides her the income that she needs for the family's sustainability.

Esterlita is in need of additional capital for the expansion of her business in order to generate more revenue necessary for their needs. She is asking for a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy more ingredients for baking bread and pastries such as flour, sugar, eggs, cheese and other items. Through this, she will be able to make her dream of improving her business come true.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for baking bread and pastries

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en:
Ma. Elena is a 49-year-old married woman and a mother of 10 children. They live in Panglao, Bohol, Philippines. She has been in a hog-raising business for 10 years now. This is the source of her income.

Ma. Elena works really hard in order to earn a living so that she can help her husband in meeting the needs of the family, especially the schooling of her children. 

She is asking for a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy feed and additional piglets to raise. With this, she will be able to augment her income, thus allowing her to provide some of the needs of the family and pay for the educational expenses of her children.

loans.use: to buy feed and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Laurencia

texts.en: Laurencia is 45 years old from the town of Ilagan province of Isabela. Laurencia has owned and managed a store for 10 years. She is asking for a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy coffee, sugar, noddles, canned goods and soap for her store in order to have additional income so she can meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy coffee, sugar, noddles, canned goods and soap for her store

loans.name: Francisco

texts.en: Francisco is married with 4 children. He is 50 years old and lives in the Philippines. To earn a living, Francisco is operating a service-based business providing transportation services to local community members. He has been doing this for 5 years and every month he earns 5,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to repair an existing vehicle for better service. Francisco has been a member of GDMPC since 2009. In the future, Francisco hopes to finish the education of his children and to gain double income from his business.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle for better service

loans.name: Leonor Gioconda

texts.es:
La socia es la señora Leonor, casada y madre de 3 niños, la socia antes se dedicaba a la comercialización de Artesanías en tejidos, pero ahora ha cambiado de rubro, ahora se dedica a la comercialización de ropa para damas, actividad que realiza de manera directa y a solicitud de su clientela.
Leonor solicita el préstamo  para comprar mercadería como vestidos y accesorios como carteras, correas y bufandas, para capitalizar su negocio y cumplir con las solicitudes de sus clientas.
La socia está muy agradecida con KIVA por ayudarla en el fortalecimiento de su actividad y por permitirle procurarles una mejor educación a sus hijos los cuales están en edad escolar. Leonor pertenece al banco comunal “KUKULI” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en:
Leonor’s married and the mother of three children.  She used to sell textile crafts but she’s changed her line of work.  Now, she sells women’s clothes directly to customer order.

Leonor is asking for the loan to buy merchandise like dresses and accessories like purses, belts and scarves to capitalize the business and fill customer orders.

She is very grateful to Kiva for helping her strengthen her activity and for making it possible for her to provide her children who are school age with a better education.  Leonor belongs to the “Kukuli” communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like dresses and accessories like purses and belts.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La  Señora Francisca tiene 52 años de edad, es soltera por viudez, vive en compañía de su hija, nieto y yerno en el Municipio de La Masica, Departamento de Atlántida.
Comenzó su negocio de venta de alimentos de manera ambulante hace 18 años, con el fin de obtener ingresos y apoyar la economía familiar.
Doña Francisca elabora y vende comida en general y su especialidad es la elaboración de donas, pastelitos, baleadas, tacos y hamburguesas. 
Ha solicitado un crédito por la cantidad de 15,000 Lempiras para la compra de insumos o materia prima para la preparación de alimentos.
Ella espera que sus ventas aumenten para que su negocio crezca, además ha planificando el establecimiento de un local (caseta) en un punto fijo para realizar la venta de sus alimentos.
texts.en:
Francisca, 52, is single due to widowhood.  She lives with her daughter, grandson and son-in-law in the municipality of La Masica, Atlántida Department.

She started selling food from place to place 18 years ago aiming at earning income and support her family’s economy.  Francisca makes and sells food in general but her specialty is making donuts, turnovers, ‘baleadas’ [flour tortilla filled with eggs, beans, etc.], tacos and hamburgers.

She’s requested a 15,000 Lempira loan to buy ingredients or raw materials to prepare her food.  She hopes her sales will increase so that the business will grow.  She’s also planning to set up a kiosk in a fixed locale to sell her food.

loans.use: to buy food preparation ingredients.

loans.name: Meyling De La Cruz

texts.es: Meyling estudiante de la carera de comunicación social, empezó a trabajar a la edad de 23 años como asistente de admisión. Solicita crédito para poder pagar el curso de titulación, sin esta oportunidad de préstamo no pudiera obtener el título de licenciatura de manera inmediata, la otra alternativa seria pagarlo con cuotas más altas a la universidad y para ella es muy difícil pagar más por su situación económica, le interesa mucho su profesión por que le gusta el periodismo, su familia y comunidad se beneficiarían atravez de los aportes que ella va a brindar a su país por medio de su carrera. El consejo que brinda es que los jóvenes  aprovechen las oportunidades de beneficencia que brinda KIVA y AFODENIC, que se puede contar con ellos para el desarrollo de nuevos profesionales en nuestro país.
texts.en:
Meyling is studying for a degree in social communications. She began working at the age of 23 as an admission’s assistant. She is requesting a loan in order to pay the final fees to register her degree. Without a loan she would not be able to officially obtain her degree in a timely manner. The other alternative would be to register by making higher payments on the installment plan to the university and it is very difficult for her to pay more because of her financial situation. 

Meyling is very interested in her profession because she enjoys journalism. Both her family and community will benefit from the contributions she will make to her country through her career. She advises young people to take advantage of the opportunities offered by KIVA lenders and AFODENIC. One can rely on them to develop new professionals in our country.

loans.use: to pay to register her degree.

loans.name: María Rebeca

texts.es: María Rebeca  de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a sus hijos y su madre en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas y adicional a esto para complementar los gastos del hogar posee una pequeña tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad, frijoles, arroz, pan, leche, jabones, entre otros, su negocio esta ubicado en una zona de alta población, es muy conocido y ya tiene mucha clientela, la prefieren porque su tienda es la mas surtida con productos de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio excelente; María es una mujer activa, muy trabajadora y dispuesta a cumplir sus sueños, se esfuerza día con día para alcanzar el éxito, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, bebidas, pan, chicharrón, queso, verduras, etc. María Rebeca tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, es responsable y asegura saldar la deuda, a la vez tiene fe que podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Rebeca is 39 years old and lives with her children and her mother in their own house. She sells pupusas and additionally, to earn for the house expenses, she also has a small store where she sells basic products such as beans, rice, bread, milk, and soap, among others. Her business is located in an area of high population, is very well known and she already has many customers who prefer her because the store is the most stocked with quality products, affordable prices and excellent service.

María in an active woman, hardworking and willing to fulfill her dreams. She strives every day to succeed. In the last months, her demand increased and she wants to take advantage of it by making a new investment. She doesn't have enough capital to do it, that's why she is requesting a loan to INTEGRAL to buy grains, sweets, beverages, bread, pork scratchings, cheese, vegetables, etc.

María Rebeca has good payment references from her acquaintances, she is responsible and assures to pay off the debt. At the same time, she has faith that she will be able to offer a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy grains, sweets, beverages, bread, pork scratching, cheese, and vegetables.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda is a brave person who can do anything for her family. She is 57 years old and married with three grown up children. She has managed a store for 30 years. In order to expand her business, she is requesting a loan of PHP 23,000 to buy snacks, canned goods, spices and noodles for her store. She hopes she can see her children finish their schooling.

loans.use: to buy snacks, canned goods, spices and noodles for her store

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en: Jimmy, 35 years old, is a married entrepreneur from Imelda, Aurora with three children and is earning an income from his transport service business. It started three years ago and he earns 6,000 PHP a month. To improve business, he borrowed 15,000 from GDMPC microcredit, which he just joined in 2011 to obtain accessories and tires. Before long, he’s hopeful of the possibility of expanding his business.

loans.use: to obtain accessories and tires

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy scrap for her husband's recycling business

loans.name: Nemecio

texts.en: Nemecio is married with 11 children. He is 53 years old and lives in Sta. Cruz, Kapatagan. To earn a living, Nemecio is operating a general store, selling a variety of products to local community members. He has been doing this for 3 years and every month he earns 5,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.. In 2011, Nemecio joined GDMPC. Nemecio hopes to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Laureta

texts.en:
Laureta is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business. Laureta has been in this business for five years. She earns additional income from a general store.

Laureta has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Kalybu

texts.ru:
Калыбю 50 лет, замужем, 2 детей. Калыбю в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, на протяжении  20 лет занимается полеводством  и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 1,000 сом (KGS ). Благодаря упорному труду Калыбю в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 2 дойных коров с приплодом, 3 лошади, ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 17,000 сом (KGS). Также Калыбю обрабатывает 3 га земли, где выращивает клевер, служащий кормом для скота и овощи – картофель, тыкву и лук. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Калыбю обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойной коровы в целях увеличения надоев молока.  Доходы от кредита Калыбю планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса посредством закупа дополнительных голов скота, чтобы по возвращению из армии младшего сына провести свадьбу.
texts.en: Kalybu is 50 years old, married and has two children.  To provide the primary source of income for her family, she has been involved in farming and animal husbandry for 20 years, having started this business with 1,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Kalybu's hard work, today her business contains two dairy cows with offspring and three horses, and the monthly profit from the business amounts to about 17,000 som (KGS).  She also works on three hectares of land, growing clover, used for livestock feed, and vegetables - potatoes, pumpkins and onions.  In order to further develop her business, Kalybu requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy a dairy cow in order to increase milk volumes.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into developing her business by buying additional livestock, so that she could hold a wedding for her youngest son upon his return from the army.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to increase milk volumes

loans.name: Blanca Nieves

texts.es:
La señora Blanca, es socia del banco comunal “las margaritas”. Distrito De Coronel  Portillo, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 57 años de edad, soltera, un hijo.
