She’ been doing this for several years now and her workshop is located in the Villa Cotopachi zone.  This loan is her first sequence in the institution.  Carla will use it to service her car and to buy an engine for it.  Her reason for requesting the loan is the lack of capital and this vehicle helps her transport her work merchandise.  The business challenge Carla faces is to continue improving the quality of her sewing clothes and will use profits to continue increasing working capital for her wish for her business is that it continues growing and producing a variety of articles.  Carla feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy a car engine and to service the vehicle.

loans.name: Leny Elizabeth

texts.es:
Leny,  vive en casa alquilada, tiene treinta y seis años de edad, tiene dos hijos de seis y de nueve años,  ella es la única  que trabaja para obtener los ingresos del hogar,  se dedica a la venta de pupusas, fue iniciativa propia poner el negocio, tiene dos años trabajando.
Ella  ha solicitado un préstamo para comprar materia prima para hacer el producto como lo son: maíz, aceites, carnes, quesillo, tomates, repollo, lo cual le permitirá aumentar sus ventas.
Su sueño es mantener el negocio que le permita salir adelante en las situaciones económicas que se presenten como suplir necesidades de salud y  alimentacion.
texts.en:
Leny lives in a rented house.  She’s 36-years-old and has two children who are 6 and 9 years of age. She’s the only one who works to earn household income.  She sells pupusas [filled, grilled corncakes].  She opened the business on her own initiative and has been working two years.

She has requested the loan to buy raw materials like corn, oil, meats, string cheese, tomatoes and cabbage to make her pupusas in order to increase her sales.  Her dream is to stay in business so that she can overcome economic difficulties that arise like covering health and food costs.

loans.use: to buy food preparation ingredients.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro, se decidió por otro crédito, por necesidad de invertir en su negocio, el crédito lo necesita para comprar pulseras, CD, juguetes, todo lo relacionado con la bisutería para sacarlo a la venta, este prestamo le sera muy util para fortalcer su mercaderia.
Su experiencia con el crédito anterior le dio mucho beneficio; porque aumentaron sus utilidades , su familia se ha mantenido; pero su calidad de vida a mejorado.
texts.en:
Pedro opted for another loan because he needs to invest in his business.  He needs the loan to buy bracelets, CDs, toys and everything related to costume jewelry to sell.  This loan will be very useful for him to strengthen his merchandise.  

His prior credit experience was very beneficial because his profits increased.  His family has remained stable but its quality of life has been improving.

loans.use: to buy bracelets, CDs and toys.

loans.name: Jose Armando

texts.es:
José, se dedica al cultivo de maíz, ayote y tambien tiene un molino de nixtamal, tiene cuarenta y ocho años de edad, es casado, tiene tres hijos  de 1,3 y 9 años de edad.
Se dedica a dicha actividad desde hace treinta años trabaja todo los días de 5.00am a las 4.00pm  dependiendo la temporada, a la fecha no presenta riesgo alguno.
Nos solicita un crédito para la compra de abono, herbicidas y otros fertilizantes agrícolas y de esta manera  ayudara la produccion de su cultivo y a toda su familia con los gastos económicos.Sus sueños y aspiraciones es sacar adelante a sus hijos con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Jose is a farmer who grows corn and pumpkins, and he also has a tortilla-flour mill. He is 48 years old, married, and has 3 children, ages 1, 3 and 9. Jose has farmed for the last 30 years, working every day from 5:00 am until 4:00 pm, depending upon the season. At present, he presents no [financial] risk whatsoever.

Jose is requesting a loan to buy manure, herbicides and other agricultural fertilizers. In this manner, he hopes to boost crop production and aid everyone in his family with their economic expenses. His dreams and aspirations are to advance his children in their studies.

loans.use: purchase manure, herbicides and other fertilizers for his corn and pumpkin crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clay and cement.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, de 46 años, es una mujer alegre y con muchas ganas de vivir, es soltera y tiene 4 hijos y con ellos comparte su casa propia que construyó con su ex pareja mientras vivían junto a él, día a día luchan  por salir adelante y mejorar su nivel de vida. María inicia su trabajo desde muy temprano con la compra de distintas frutas de la región como papayas, bananas, naranjas y otros productos las cuales adquiere del mercado principal de la ciudad en la que vive. La venta lo realiza en su casa, ahí acondiciona una mesa amplia en donde exhibe todos los productos que pone a la venta para satisfacción de su clientela. Eventualmente realiza mermeladas con las frutas que están mas maduras y posteriormente también los pone a la venta. Su vivienda está ubicada en un zona muy transitada y eso le permite tener a diario muy buenas ventas. Lleva en ésta actividad más de 4 años y trabaja generalmente sola aunque a veces recibe la ayuda de sus hijos. Complementa este negocio con la venta de gaseosas y helados cuyas ganancias le ayudan a sobrellevar los gastos básicos de su hogar. Le gusta su trabajo porque le permite desarrollar un actividad que no requiere de gran esfuerzo, además le permite tener el tiempo libre necesario por las tardes para realizar otras funciones que también le rinden ganancias, espera agrandar su negocio pues tiene todas las ganas y el deseo de poder superar sus mismas expectativas. Este es el crédito número 3 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que existen personas que le brindan un apoyo financiero que le permitirá estar más tranquila y avanzar con sus planes de su negocio, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual y sobre todo compenetrarse más con los integrantes de su banco comunal que son muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará mas frutas para implementar su negocio, además comprará yuca y plátano ya que son productos de gran demanda por parte de sus clientes.
texts.en:
María, who is 46 years old, is a joyful woman with a passion for life.  She is single and has four children with whom she shares her home which she built with her ex while they were living together.  Day after day, they struggle to get ahead and improve their quality of life.  María begins working very early, purchasing the various regional fruits like papayas, bananas, oranges and other products which she acquires from the main market in the city where she lives.  She makes her sales out of her home; she has a large table set up where she displays all of the products that she sells for the satisfaction of her customers.  Eventually, she makes jams with the fruits that are very ripe and then she also sells them.  Her home is located in a well traveled area and this allows her to have very good sales on a daily basis.  She has worked over four years at this and she generally works by herself, although sometimes she receives help from her children.  She supplements this business with the sale of soft drinks and ice cream, the profits from which help her to bear the household expenses.  She enjoys her work because it allows her to complete tasks that don't require great effort.  Moreover, it permits her to have the necessary free time in the afternoons to complete other tasks which also provide income.  She hopes to expand her business.  She has the willpower and the desire to be able to supersede her own expectations.  This is her third loan with MFP and she is very happy to know that there exist people who offer financial support that will allow her to be more calm and advance with her business plan.  Moreover, she promises to make her payments punctually and above all, to empathize with the other members of her communal bank who are very supportive.

With the amount of 1000 soles requested, she will purchase more fruits to add to her business, as well as yucca and plantains, since they are products with a high demand from her customers.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit, yucca, and plantains.

loans.name: Eugenio Jose

texts.es:
Eugenio esta casado y tiene hijos pequeños.El es un hombre humilde muy trabajador se dedica a la pesca desde muy joven su padre le enseño esta actividad  y desde entonces no ha parado de hacer esta labor.

El es el sustento de su hogar y su esposa se dedica al cuidado de los niños ya  que son muy pequeños aun, una de las  dificultades que el tiene son los piratas de los rios.

El sueño de Eugenio es terminar su casa por completo ya que la esta construyendo poco a poco debido a la falta de recursos. con el prestamo desea comprar una lancha con motor para seguir su negocio anhela que sus hijos estudien y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Eugenio is married and has small children.  He is a very hard-working, humble man.  He has been fishing since he was very young.  That is when his father taught him this business activity.  From then on he has not stopped doing this work.

He supports his household, and his wife devotes herself to caring for the children because they are still very young.  The pirates on the river are one of the difficulties that he has.

Eugenio’s dream is to completely finish his house.  He is building it little by little due to the lack of resources.  

Using the loan he hopes to buy a motorboat in order to continue his business.  He wishes for his children to get an education and to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy a fishing boat.
